UserManagement.title: QIG Team Management
UserManagement.name: Name
UserManagement.description: This page allows EO/AO to create/import the users to the Project. EO/AO can view all the users details and also edit/delete/suspend users from the project. All the QIG's of a project will be displayed in tabs where EO/AO can upload/assign the Project users to a QIG. EO/AO can view the details of users with edit/promote option under respective QIG and the users can be deleted/suspended from the QIG.
UserManagement.Deletealertmessage: Are you sure, you want to Un-Tag the user from this QIG ?
UserManagement.Suspendalertmessage: Are you sure you want to suspend this marker from this QIG?
UserManagement.Resumealertmessage: Are you sure you want to cancel the suspension of this marker from this QIG?

UserManagement.Unblockalertmessage: Are you sure, you want to Unblock the user for this QIG ?

UserManagement.desc: This page allows EO/AO to upload the Supervisor (Immediate reporting) for respective User/Marker's of a QIG. Here EO/AO can download the file format and provide the mandatory fields like User's LoginName,Role and ReportingTo and can upload the same.
UserManagement.getusererror: Error while getting the user details
UserManagement.useralredydeleted: User Already Un-tagged from this QIG
UserManagement.selectfile: Please select a CSV File to Upload.
UserManagement.downloadusers: Download Template With Project User Details
UserManagement.step1: In this page, a CSV file is browsed. The CSV file contains the fields namely LoginName, Role and ReportingTo.
UserManagement.step2: In CSV file, dont provide 'AO' details.
UserManagement.step3: After selecting the CSV file, click the 'Upload' button.

UserManagement.UserWithdrawPageDescription: This functionality allows the AO to select one or more candidates and change their status as 'withdrawn'. For the withdrawn candidates, the results are not shared to iExams2.
UserManagement.UserSuspendednote: There are a few scripts in the workspace of the marker. They will be returned to the live pool.
